oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter from Capt. Archibald D. Norris, Co. K, 7th Tenn. Inf. Regt., CSA to his father
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Letter from Capt. A..D. Norris, Co. K, 7th Tenn. Inf. Regt., CSA to his father. He writes of the accidental death of fellow soldier Clark Harrison of the Lebanon Grays, Christmas dinner in camp, and the surprise order on Christmas day to break camp and; march toward Winchester. He closes this letter like he closes many, with a discussion of his clothing situation.
